caption: Table 1: Summary of theoretical results.
description: This table summarizes the theoretical convergence rates achieved by the proposed adaptive gradient descent methods (AdGD and AdProxGD) and compares them to the convergence rates of standard gradient descent and proximal gradient methods.  It highlights the conditions under which each method achieves its respective rate, emphasizing the advantages of the adaptive methods in scenarios where the gradient's Lipschitz constant is unknown or varies significantly.
